name: Shadow Slash
description:
Pitch :   

Shadow Slash is a jam fighting game, in which you play as ninja in a futuristic world where the resources are limited. Your goal is to kill your opponents to survive. Eject them out of the battle area to make them lose all their lives, and win the brawl!    

Controller : Features :

In this brawler, you can play from 2 to 4 players on three different maps. You dispose of a dash, a double jump and three attacks, each can be used on ground or in the air. You can use the dash to dodge attacks. Your goal is to eject your opponents out of the edges. Some of the platforms can be destroyed by throwing players on them. If you hit an enemy with the tip of your sword, he will go farther than with a closer hit.
